version_description: Watch your rewards grow and your prices drop with our new official app.
Watch your rewards grow and your prices drop with our new official app. See how big of a discount you’ve earned, calculate future savings, clip coupons and browse sales at your store.
Minor bug fixes and copy updates
Watch your rewards grow and your prices drop with our new official app. See how big of a discount you’ve earned, calculate future savings, clip coupons, browse sales, and even order food from GetGo!

Watch your rewards grow and your prices drop. Track your perks and earn even more with our new official app. Now you can browse sales and clip eCoupons, or order gift cards and GetGo food. It’s all right here!

We made more updates. Now your Giant Eagle app experience is even better!

•Search within our weekly sale for specific products or categories
•Plus, enjoy performance improvement and other bug fixes

New Year, new features! The Giant Eagle app is more convenient than ever thanks to our new Shopping List section.

- Home screen refresh reintroducing curbside, gift cards, and GetGo
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

We’re continuing to improve your Giant Eagle app experience with our latest version.

View, Sort and filter gas prices with our updated store locator feature
Shopping list crash fix for iOS devices
Bug fixes

We want everyone to shop with ease and convenience. So we’ve made improvements to our screen reader compatibility:
•On the Home screen
•In the Weekly Ad section
•In the Store Locator, and
•On your Profile page

Additionally,
•Performance improvements for better app browsing
•Bug fixes
